message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you consider that?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $11000, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I can offer it to you for $10800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $10200. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting closer to meeting you at your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $10500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $10200. Can you meet me at that price or I'll have to consider buying from John?
